page.title: 17WOLVERHAMPTON STADIUM
page.content: The stadium is situated in the Aldersley area of W'Ton.It is the home of W'Ton and Bilston Athletics Club and W'Ton Wheelers Cycling Club.The men's athletics team has represented Britain 8 times in 9 years in the European Club Competition coming 3rd on 3 occasions. Some famous stars who compete for the club are Tessa Sanderson,Kathy and Gary Cook.Its facilities include a full size athletics stadium used in inter club competitions,a cycling track used by the Wheelers for major competitions,a weight training room and football pitch. The stadium is a community centre open to the public each day to train with advice available from the stadium's own tutor,to spectate or simply relax with a drink and something to eat in "The Aldersley".Entrance fees are reasonable 18p to spectate,23p to train.
